con:call.name: ModifyCarrierPickup Request
con:call.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:sws="http://stamps.com/xml/namespace/2020/21/swsim/SwsimV106">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <sws:ModifyCarrierPickup>\r <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:Authenticator>?</sws:Authenticator>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:Credentials>\r <sws:IntegrationID>?</sws:IntegrationID>\r <sws:Username>?</sws:Username>\r <sws:Password>?</sws:Password>\r </sws:Credentials>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:ContactInformation>\r <sws:FirstName>?</sws:FirstName>\r <sws:LastName>?</sws:LastName>\r <sws:PhoneNumber>?</sws:PhoneNumber>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:PhoneExt/>\r </sws:ContactInformation>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:PackageInformation>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:NumberOfExpressMailPieces>0</sws:NumberOfExpressMailPieces>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:NumberOfPriorityMailPieces>0</sws:NumberOfPriorityMailPieces>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:NumberOfInternationalPieces>0</sws:NumberOfInternationalPieces>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:NumberOfFirstClassPieces>0</sws:NumberOfFirstClassPieces>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:NumberOfParcelSelectPieces>0</sws:NumberOfParcelSelectPieces>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:NumberOfOtherPieces>0</sws:NumberOfOtherPieces>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:TotalWeightOfPackagesLbs>0</sws:TotalWeightOfPackagesLbs>\r <sws:PackageLocation>?</sws:PackageLocation>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:SpecialInstruction>?</sws:SpecialInstruction>\r </sws:PackageInformation>\r <sws:ConfirmationNumber>?</sws:ConfirmationNumber>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:Carrier>USPS</sws:Carrier>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:PickupType>Default</sws:PickupType>\r </sws:ModifyCarrierPickup>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>
